attributes.action: impose a life ban from driving or owning a motor vehicle on any person commiting driving offence(s) resulting in 6 points or more
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Such a ban would remove both bad drivers from the roads and also their uninsured, unroadworthy, untaxed vehicles. This would have the effect of both reducing traffic congestion and pollution.
